headline: Meet the Future of Autonomous Wildfire Response: XPRIZE Wildfire Announces Finalist Teams Advancing in $11M Competition
summary: XPRIZE, the world's leader in designing and operating large-scale incentive competitions to solve humanity's grand challenges, in partnership with co-title sponsors Pacific Gas and Electric Company (PG&E) and the Gordon and Betty Moore Foundation, today announced the five finalist teams advancing in the Autonomous Wildfire Response Track of XPRIZE Wildfire, an $11 million global competition incentivizing the innovation of firefighting technologies. The finalists were announced today at an event

The finalists were announced today at an event

headline: Lockheed Martin Weighs GPS Launches Wildfire Venture And Strong Share Gains
summary: Lockheed Martin (NYSE:LMT) launched the ninth GPS III satellite, GPS III SV09, expanding the modernized GPS constellation for military and civilian users. The company secured several new defense contracts tied to aviation and naval programs, adding fresh backlog tied to core defense platforms. Lockheed Martin joined forces with PG&E, Salesforce, and Wells Fargo to form EMBERPOINT, a wildfire technology venture focused on prevention and response using autonomous and AI-enabled systems. For...

headline: Salesforce Expands Into Defense And Wildfire AI With Undervalued Shares
summary: Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) secured a US$5.6b, 10 year U.S. Army technology modernization contract. The deal runs through Salesforce subsidiaries Computable Insights and Missionforce National Security. Salesforce also launched EMBERPOINT LLC, a wildfire management venture using AI and advanced technologies. EMBERPOINT involves partners including Lockheed Martin and PG&E to support wildfire detection and response. For you as an investor, this is Salesforce stepping well beyond its core CRM and...

headline: Morgan Stanley Updates PG&E (PCG) Outlook Amid Data Center Growth and Utility Sector Laggard Performance
summary: PG&E Corporation (NYSE:PCG) is one of the best inexpensive stocks to buy now. On January 21, Morgan Stanley raised the price target on PG&E to $21 from $20 while keeping an Equal Weight. Morgan Stanley is refreshing its outlook on North American Regulated & Diversified Utilities and Independent Power Producers. The firm noted that the […]
